title: Supplementaries
description:
The legendary Java edition mod officially arrives on Bedrock! Supplementaries is the ultimate 'Vanilla+' expansion, designed to fill the gaps in the base game with stylish, functional, and clever additions. This massive add-on introduces a huge variety of animated and interactive content that blends seamlessly with the Minecraft aesthetic.

Key features include redstone contraptions like Bellows and Turn Tables, functional decor like Jars and Pedestals, and unique utilities like the Slingshot and Flute. From swinging Hanging Signs and Wind Vanes to interactive Goblets and Candle Holders, every block and item is crafted to enhance your building, automation, and survival experience without breaking immersion.
author: Razzleberries
